name: AWS resources that are publicly accessible through IAM policies
description: This policy identifies the AWS resources which are publicly accessible through IAM policies. Ensure that the AWS resources provisioned in your AWS account are not publicly accessible from the Internet to avoid sensitive data exposure and minimize security risks.
searchModel.query: config from iam where dest.cloud.type = 'AWS' and source.public = true
recommendation:
1. Log in to the AWS console
2. Navigate to the relevant service (For example, AWS S3)
3. Find resource-based policy of the resource
4. Update the ‘Principal‘ section of the policy to avoid public access
